title: Bonus Episode - Killer Casting
description:
Welcome to the premiere episode of Killer Casting. Love deep diving into the best shows and movies out there? Does no one understand your fascination with analyzing acting, dissecting dialogue, scrutinizing structure, wondering about wardrobe and yes...wittering about wallpaper? Then you are in the right place! Join Real Crime Profile's Lisa Zambetti (casting director for Criminal Minds), Brian Alan Hill (casting associate The Purge, Sneaky Pete, 12 Monkeys) and Dean Laffan (tv buff extraordinaire) as they dissect the shows they love to binge. Dark and twisty, weird and wonderful, we will cover everything you should be watching.


This week we introduce you to the amazing FX show "Mr. Inbetween", an Australian crime show with a breakout performance by Scott Ryan as an unflappable hit man. The casting story behind this show is as unique as the show itself.


#hulu

#fx

#mrinbetween

#scottryan

#bluetongue

#crimeshow

#hitman

#realcrimeprofile
